CustomField.description:
A Swim Lane can have a background image as a guide. Commonly, these images will be uploaded in static resources and referenced as /resource/STATIC_RESOURCE/IMAGE.png
Images can be any size, but, we recommed 1280x720 which fit well into presentations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
A Swim Lane can have a background image as a guide. Commonly, these images will be uploaded in static resources and referenced as /resource/STATIC_RESOURCE/IMAGE.png
Images can be any size, but, we recommed 1280x720 which fit well into presentations.
CustomField.label: Background Image
